# setPreferredInputNumberOfChannels(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the preferred number of input channels for the current route.

## Declaration

```swift
func setPreferredInputNumberOfChannels(_ count: Int) throws
```

## Parameters

- **count**: The number of input channels you want to use.

## Discussion

This method requests a change to the number of input channels. To determine whether the change has taken effect, query or key-value observe the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/inputNumberOfChannels] property.

Requesting input channels less than one or greater than that returned by the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/maximumInputNumberOfChannels] results in an error.

Set the preferred number of input channels only after setting the audio session’s category and mode, and activating the session.

## Setting the number of input channels

- **preferredInputNumberOfChannels**: The preferred number of input channels for the current route.
- **inputNumberOfChannels**: The number of audio input channels for the current route.
- **maximumInputNumberOfChannels**: The maximum number of input channels available for the current audio route.
